Rashid Obaid is an experienced embedded systems engineer with a deep-rooted passion for designing and optimizing complex electronic systems. He received an MSc in Electrical Engineering and IT from the University of Kiel, Kiel, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany in 2023, where he was advised by Prof. Dr.-Ing. Andreas Bahr during his Master Thesis. He has a wide range of experience as an Research & Development Engineer that involves a strong proficiency in MATLAB, Simulink, Python, Altium Designer, C++, CMake and SystemVerilog tools.
